sense.def:
A grant
je znesek, ki ga vlada dodeli osebi ali organizaciji za določen namen, na primer za izobraževanje ali stanovanjsko prenovo.

seg.quote: You may be eligible for a grant to help you study.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ,
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
Kadar človek, ki ima oblast,
grants someone something
, nekomu nekaj da.

seg.quote: Proposals have been made to grant each displaced family £25,000.
He was finally granted a visa.

gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To grant that something is true
pomeni priznati, da je nekaj resnično.

seg.quote: That joy ride, I grant you, was a silly stunt.

sense.def:
To take it for granted that something is true
pomeni verjeti, da je nekaj res, ne da bi o tem razmišljali.

seg.quote: It is taken for granted that every child should learn mathematics.

sense.def:
To take someone for granted
pomeni okoristiti se z nekom, ne da bi mu pokazali hvaležnost.

seg.quote: He just takes me absolutely for granted.
